meanings.definition: The quality or state of being smutty.
meanings.sent1: The smuttiness of the fireplace made it difficult to clean.
meanings.sent2: I could see the smuttiness on the window from the nearby factory.
meanings.sent3: The smuttiness of the old book made it look like it had been through a lot.
meanings.sent4: Her hands were covered in smuttiness after working in the coal mine all day.
meanings.sent5: The smuttiness of the air in the city was a constant reminder of industrial pollution.

meanings.definition: The presence of smut or soot.
meanings.sent1: The smuttiness on the walls indicated a problem with the chimney.
meanings.sent2: The old attic was filled with smuttiness from years of neglect.
meanings.sent3: The smuttiness on his face made it clear he had been working in the garage.
meanings.sent4: The smuttiness in the air settled on everything in the room.
meanings.sent5: The smuttiness from the bonfire left a dark residue on the ground.

meanings.sent1: The movie was criticized for its smuttiness and inappropriate scenes.
meanings.sent2: She refused to read the book due to its smuttiness and explicit language.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's jokes crossed the line into smuttiness, making the audience uncomfortable.
meanings.sent4: The smuttiness of the graffiti shocked the residents of the small town.
meanings.sent5: The smuttiness of the conversation at the party made her decide to leave early.
